headline: 3 Dividend Stocks to Buy With $500 and Hold Forever
summary: Given the sell-off, now is a good time to consider adding dividend stocks to your portfolio.  Realty Income (NYSE: O) is appealing to investors because of its monthly dividend payment.  The real estate investment trust (REIT) has a dividend yield of 5.6%, backed by its retail property footprint, which includes over 15,600 properties and tenants like 7-Eleven, Dollar General, and Walgreens.
